summary.span: 表示在 控件中使用的组合框。

span.span: Represents a combo box that is used in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图显示的示例具有图像和标签，只需具有映像，并且只有标签控件。The following illustration shows examples of controls that have images and labels, that just have images, and that just have labels. ![功能区组合框控件](~/add/media/wpfribbon-combobox.png "功能区组合框控件")![Ribbon combo box controls](~/add/media/wpfribbon-combobox.png "Ribbon combo box controls") 功能区组合框控件Ribbon combo box controls 下图显示打开下拉列表时。The following illustration shows a when the drop-down is opened. ![功能区组合框控件垂直-下打开](~/add/media/wpfribbon-combobox-selection.png "功能区组合框控件带有打开的下拉列表")![Ribbon combo box control with drop-down open](~/add/media/wpfribbon-combobox-selection.png "Ribbon combo box control with drop-down open") 带有打开的下拉菜单的功能区组合框控件Ribbon combo box control with drop-down open ## Examples 下面的示例演示创建具有三个可用的项的组合框的标记。The following example shows the markup to create a combo box with three available items. [!code-xaml[Ribbon_ControlsSample#RibbonComboBox](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_controlssample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#ribboncombobox)]
